Uses of Package
se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.events

Packages that use se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.events
Package
Description
se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.audit
Audit logging support.
se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.authnrequest
Support for processing SAML authentication requests.
se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.events
Event handling.
se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.response
Support for sending SAML response messages.
se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.web.filters
Filters for the SAML Identity Provider.
  • Classes in se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.events used by se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.audit
    Class
    Description
    AbstractSaml2IdpEventListener
    Abstract base class for an ApplicationListener for SAML2 events.
    Saml2AuthnRequestReceivedEvent
    Event that signals that a SAML2 AuthnRequest has been received.
    Saml2ErrorResponseEvent
    An event that signals that a SAML error response is being sent.
    Saml2PostUserAuthenticationEvent
    An event that is fired after the user has been authenticated by a UserAuthenticationProvider but before we filter release attributes and compile the SAML assertion.
    Saml2PreUserAuthenticationEvent
    An event that is signalled before the user is handed over to the UserAuthenticationProvider to be authenticated.
    Saml2SuccessResponseEvent
    An event that signals that a successful SAML response is being sent.
    Saml2UnrecoverableErrorEvent
    An event that is signalled if an UnrecoverableSaml2IdpException is thrown.
  • Classes in se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.events used by se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.authnrequest
    Class
    Description
    Saml2IdpEventPublisher
    A publisher for SAML IdP events.
  • Classes in se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.events used by se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.events
    Class
    Description
    AbstractSaml2IdpEvent
    Abstract base class for all events published by the SAML IdP.
    Saml2AuthnRequestReceivedEvent
    Event that signals that a SAML2 AuthnRequest has been received.
    Saml2ErrorResponseEvent
    An event that signals that a SAML error response is being sent.
    Saml2PostUserAuthenticationEvent
    An event that is fired after the user has been authenticated by a UserAuthenticationProvider but before we filter release attributes and compile the SAML assertion.
    Saml2PreUserAuthenticationEvent
    An event that is signalled before the user is handed over to the UserAuthenticationProvider to be authenticated.
    Saml2SuccessResponseEvent
    An event that signals that a successful SAML response is being sent.
    Saml2UnrecoverableErrorEvent
    An event that is signalled if an UnrecoverableSaml2IdpException is thrown.
